description: Detects possible malicious execution of JXA in-memory via OSAScript
author: Sohan G (D4rkCiph3r)
name: JXA In-memory Execution Via OSAScript
query: ((process.command_line.text:*osascript* AND process.command_line.text:*\ \-e\ * AND process.command_line.text:*eval* AND process.command_line.text:*NSData.dataWithContentsOfURL*) AND (((process.command_line.text:*\ \-l\ * AND process.command_line.text:*JavaScript*)) OR (process.command_line.text:*.js*)))
